1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Shorthand functions.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Overture.Shorthand
6 ( int, integer,
7   nothing,
8 ) where
9
10import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture.Type as O
11
12-- | 'Int' shorthand.
13--
14--   >>> int 12
15--   12
16--
17--   This is same as:
18--
19--   >>> 12 :: Int
20--   12
21--
22int :: O.Map Int
23{-# INLINE int #-}
24int = id
25
26-- | 'Integer' shorthand.
27--
28--   >>> integer 12
29--   12
30--
31--   This is same as:
32--
33--   >>> 12 :: Integer
34--   12
35--
36integer :: O.Map Integer
37{-# INLINE integer #-}
38integer = id
39
40-- | Function which always returns 'Nothing'.
41--
42--   >>> nothing True :: Maybe String
43--   Nothing
44--
45nothing :: a -> Maybe b
46nothing _ = Nothing
